[[1975â76 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1975â76]] |} [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] had relegated from [[Turkish First Football League]] in [[1973â74 Turkish First Football League|1973â74]] season. It was the first relegation of the team after 7 season first league experience. The 1974â75 season was the fifth season of [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) football team in [[Turkish Second Football League]], the second level division in [[Turkey]]. They finished 3rd in the red group. ==Pre-season== * MÄ°Y-Adana Demirspor: 0-0. * MÄ°Y-GÃ¶ztepe: 3-1. * MÄ°Y-GenÃ§lerbirliÄi: 2-0. ==1974â75 league participation== In its 12th season ([[1974â75 Turkish Second Football League|1974â75]]), [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] was played with 32 teams, 16 in red group and 16 in white group. Group winners promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] [[1975â76 Turkish First Football League|1975â76]] and last teams relegated to [[Turkish Third Football League|Third League]] [[1975â76 Turkish Third Footbal League|1975â76]] in each group.
